DataElement.preferredName: Patient Information Format Preference Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free text field to specify the format preference, that is different than the one(s) previously specified, that the patient prefers.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._The organization of information according to preset specifications._The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.
